alert.note: Alert for Black Hawk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 6:28PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Black Hawk County through 700 PM CDT... At 628 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waterloo Municipal Airport, or near Waterloo, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Evansdale and Elk Run Heights around 640 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 63 and 70, and near mile marker 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
